ray.rage.rendersystem.shader

Interface GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, GpuShaderProgram.Input<T>, Managed<GpuShaderProgram>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GpuShaderProgram.Attribute<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGlslProgramAttribute, AbstractGlslProgramAttributeBuffer, AbstractGlslProgramStorageBuffer, GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec2, GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec3, GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec4, GlslProgramIndexBuffer, GlslProgramStorageBufferFloat
    Enclosing interface:
    GpuShaderProgram

    public static interface GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer<T>
extends GpuShaderProgram.Input<T>
    A dynamic storage buffer for input data that receives a buffer ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBufferId()
      Gets the ID generated by the underlying driver for the program to uniquely identify this buffer.
